SEARCH
Package fr.uge.patchwork

Class Game

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork.Game
public class Game extends Object
Class representing the Game object. class grouping all the parameters needed to start a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int mode)
    Constuctor who initialize the Game Object. combines an available patch list, a button bank (Money object), a general game board for both players, a game mode and a variable to representer the neutral pawn.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int mode)
      Constuctor who initialize the Game Object. combines an available patch list, a button bank (Money object), a general game board for both players, a game mode and a variable to representer the neutral pawn.
      Parameters:
      mode - : int who representing the selected mode at the game start.

  • Method Details

    • helpInitFile

      public static ArrayList<Integer> helpInitFile(int word, int compteur, int height, int lenght, int bouton, int mouvement, int cout)
      Function that changes the numbers if necessary and puts them in a list to be able to collect them later.
      Parameters:
      word - : int who representing the word used to initialize a patch.
      compteur - : int who representing the counter to different case.
      height - : int who representing a height.
      lenght - : int who representing a length.
      bouton - : int who representing a value of a button.
      mouvement - : int who representing a movement (choose) in a game.
      cout - : int who representing a cost a patch.
      Returns:
      ArrayList : ArrayList who contains all new parameters.

    • patchInitialisation2

      public void patchInitialisation2(Path file) throws IOException
      method that initializes patches from a file received as a parameter, and adds them to the patch list of the game.
      Parameters:
      file - : (Path) File who contains the different patch of a game.
      Throws:
      IOException - : Exception for a Path (file).

    • verificationIfPatchIsPresent

      public static boolean verificationIfPatchIsPresent(List<Patch> arrayPatch)
      Static method who return false if the list of patches is empty, ortherwise false.
      Parameters:
      arrayPatch - : (List) patch who contains patches.
      Returns:
      boolean : boolean who returns state of the List (patch).

      Static method that displays game steps during a game.

      player - : (Player) Player object who represent a player.
      arrayPlay - : (Table) Table object who represent the arrayPatch of a Player.
      pion - : (boolean) boolean that represents a player's turn.

      pion - : (int) integer who represent the pawn of a player in the game.

    • buyPatch

      public int buyPatch(Player Player, Patch patchWanted, int pion, Scanner scanner)
      Method that purchases a patch by a player, and return state of a transaction.
      Parameters:
      Player - : (Player) Objects who represent the player in this game.
      patchWanted - : (Patch) Object who represent a patch that the player wants to buy.
      pion - : (int) integer who represent the pawn of a player in the game.
      scanner - : (Scanner) Browse a stream and retrieve its content.
      Returns:
      int : (int) Return 0 if the transaction good, and 1 otherwise.

    • printPatch

      public static int printPatch(int pos, List<Patch> arrayPatch)
      Static method to print all different patch during an purchase.
      Parameters:
      pos - : (int) integer thats represents the position of the current patch.
      arrayPatch - : (List) List which contains all patches
      Returns:
      int : integer who represents the different patch available.

    • indexOfArrayPatchWanted

      public int indexOfArrayPatchWanted(int caseWanted, int cpt)
      Method that returns the next position index of the received patch as a parameter depending on the choice received.
      Parameters:
      caseWanted - : (int) integer representing the index of the next case.
      cpt - : (int) integer representing the number of the neutral pawn.
      Returns:
      int : integer who represents the next index position of the patch.

    • selectPatch

      public void selectPatch(Player player, int pion, int cpt, Scanner scanner)

      Parameters:
      player - : (Player) Objects who represent the player in this game.
      pion - : (int) integer who represent the pawn of a player in the game.
      cpt - : (int) integer representing the number of the neutral pawn.
      scanner - : (Scanner) Browse a stream and retrieve its content.

      Parameters:
      pion - : (int) integer who represent the pawn of a player in the game.
      array - : (Table) Objects representing the array game.

      Function that initializes a terminal game.
      Parameters:
      game - : Representing all element during a game, variable of Game type.
      player1 - : Variable who representing a Player during a graphical game.
      player2 - : Variable who representing a Player during a graphical game.
      scanner - : Variable of a Scanner type who contains the value enter by an user.
